root.name: Duke Nukem Advance
root.description: OverviewDuke Nukem Advance is a first-person shooter developed by Torus and published by Take-Two Interactive for the Game Boy Advance on August 12, 2002. Although some of the graphics and sounds come from Duke Nukem 3D, much of the game's content was developed just for this game, including a new storyline that takes titular action hero Duke Nukem through Area 51, Egyptian temples, Sydney, and an orbiting alien spaceship in order to find and exterminate the alien menace.The game also features multi-link multiplayer for up to four players in the traditional deathmatch mode (known as Dukematch).
